text: Do people actually care  or am I nuts So  I ll be honest  not sure if this goes here  but I figure I should ask anyway One of the biggest things I see with like suicide prevention advice is how big of an impact on others it d have and all that stuff  I ve even gotten it myself  for better or for worse  However  there s something that always bugged me Whenever I see people react to suicide or death in general  most of the time they seem to just get over it quickly Or rather  it seems like the usual response to suicide I see from people is just a  ah  damn  that sucks  then about   minutes later they are onto a new subject  or don t even really bother to begin with  I mention this because I ve seen this response to death a lot  in an online community I was in  someone committed suicide  I think  it s hard to confirm  and no one reacted to their last message  or even noticed that they were gone until I said anything about it  even then it was the typical  sheesh  that sucks  then forgotten about minutes later  Today  a friend  still don t know if I m using that word too casually given how short of a time I ve known them  mentioned how they just found out their old mentor killed themselves last night  and after about   seconds everyone including him had moved back onto joking and laughing and it didn t seem like anyone paid any attention to it at all I m not trying to sound cold or anything  Maybe I m just insane here and have a bad read on people s emotions  but it always makes me wonder  do people actually care if you kill yourself  People have told me that when I ve mentioned my suicidal ideations  but the more I look around the more I wonder if that s actually true or just something people are just saying  I unno  I hope this doesn t come off as callous  I genuinely don t understand
summary: There was a suicide in an online community. The usual response to suicide is just a sheesh that sucks and then they move on to a new subject. In the community I was in someone committed suicide and no one reacted to their last message.
cleaned: suicide online community usual response suicide shoe suck new subject community commit suicide no react message

text: Suicide feels like a dignified exit from an increasingly inhumane worldHuman societies are the most fragmented they ve ever been  Everybody has been commoditized  you are an employee judged by the level of  human capital  you can provide a company before you are a person  Executive and investor interests take precedent over the well being of   of the planet   The insidious ness is so far reaching it permeates everything  We re told status is everything  And yet high status is completely unattainable for almost everyone from the moment they re born   Work hard  hustle  grind  are the supposed ingredients for a good life  yet the end result will leave a person no happier than the person with literally nothing  Everything is a false promise designed to get you to shut up and produce and or consume I m tired of being an  employee  or a  consumer  I m tired of being a single line in a near infinite database  I m tired of being the subject of market research analytics  I m tired of people refusing to see how it actually is  And I m god damned tired of being told suicide isn t worth it  Because as far as mental health goes  we re trending downwards  getting steeper and steeper with each technological innovation that leaves us further encumbered by the heavy  soul crushing weight of a world designed to appease a minuscule few
